title: Mid Grade Hall of Fame T206's Available at my eBay Store
author: Buythatcard

posts.post_title: Mid Grade Hall of Fame T206's Available at my eBay Store
posts.post_content:
Over a 10 day period, I will be listing mid grade T206's.  All of them Hall of Famers.  The following players will all be available at my eBay store.  They will all be auction style.  In addition, there will be other T206's and they will be BINs.

Sam Crawford HOF 1909-11 T206 - Throwing, Sweet Caporal 150/30 - SGC 4 – 5/18/20

Addie Joss HOF 1909-11 T206 - Pitching, Sweet Caporal 350/30 - PSA 5 – 5/19/20

Rube Waddell HOF 1909-11 T206 - Throwing, Sweet Caporal 150/30 - PSA 4.5  - 5/20/20

Iron Man McGinnity HOF 1909-11 T206 - Piedmont 350/25 - PSA 6 – 5/21/20

Zack Wheat HOF 1909-11 T206 - Piedmont 350-460/25 - SGC 4 – 5/22/20

Clark Griffith HOF 1909-11 T206 - Batting, Sweet Caporal 350/30 - SGC 3 – 5/23/20

Tris Speaker HOF 1909-11 T206 - Sweet Caporal 350/30 - SGC 20 – 5/24/20

Addie Joss HOF 1909-11 T206 - Portrait, Sweet Caporal 150/30 - PSA 2 – 5/25/20

John McGraw HOF 1909-11 T206 - Portrait, No Cap, Sweet Caporal 150/30 - SGC 50 – 5/26/20

Joe Tinker HOF 1909-11 T206 - Bat Off Shoulder, Polar Bear - PSA 3 – MK – 5/27/20


Follow the link to see all my graded T206's:  [URL="https://www.ebay.com/str/buythatcard/1909-11-T206-Graded/_i.html?_storecat=8356407011"]https://www.ebay.com/str/buythatcard/1909-11-T206-Graded/_i.html?_storecat=8356407011[/URL]

Sam Crawford HOF 1909-11 T206 - Throwing, Sweet Caporal 150/30 - SGC 4 – 5/18/20

Addie Joss HOF 1909-11 T206 - Pitching, Sweet Caporal 350/30 - PSA 5 – 5/19/20

Rube Waddell HOF 1909-11 T206 - Throwing, Sweet Caporal 150/30 - PSA 4.5  - 5/20/20

Iron Man McGinnity HOF 1909-11 T206 - Piedmont 350/25 - PSA 6 – 5/21/20

Zack Wheat HOF 1909-11 T206 - Piedmont 350-460/25 - SGC 4 – 5/22/20

Over the next 5 nights, these cards will be available to bid on.

Clark Griffith HOF 1909-11 T206 - Batting, Sweet Caporal 350/30 - SGC 3 – 5/23/20

Tris Speaker HOF 1909-11 T206 - Sweet Caporal 350/30 - SGC 20 – 5/24/20
